column1: Baby Barnaby's////*While they are very accommodating
column2: I will say that my recent trip here - I was caught rather off guard. They have done a lot of improvements on the "waiting patio" to keep it shaded & cooler. Yay
column3: thank you for that! However as a storm rolled in
column4: and rain came in sideways they don't have any drop down/roll down protection! They had to move slightly damp patrons inside... taking up some tables that would have been for guests on the waiting list. It is Houston
column5: and crazy rain is known to happen - so be aware of this when you are deciding where to sit... At least until they add some rain shields!*
